tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review:
First time I visited Dr Dipta Shankha Chakraborty was in the month of December 2017 for a check up. I was referred to him by one of the leading Orthodontist of Kolkata  who was treating my son. The resaons for my visit  was to take his opinion after being a victim of improperly carried out RCT in my lower right side teeth which was done elsewhere and I was having lot of problems and also for fixing a bridge on my upper left side.
He carried out re-RCT and fixed the bridge which took few sittings. I was visiting him from Ranchi for this treatment and I used to fix up prior appointments before visiting him which worked out  smoothly without any inconvenience to me. I am very much satisfied with his treatment and I do not have any problem now. 
I was fortunate that I could see Dr Chakraborty who analysed the problem thoroughly and solved it to my satisfaction. I have received the most professional and high quality service. He is gentle, caring, ************* and perfectionist. His support team is excellent.  Isnâ€™t that what we are looking for our dental treatment. I would recommend him to every one.

context: Zirconia Crowns,Microscope Assisted Root Canal Treatment,
review: Dr sir is an amazing person, took care of me like his own younger brother. Technically, his treatment resulted very fine for me. I am writing this feedback after 2 months of treatment and I just took this time to see if I actually recovered or its just an influence of medicine.. ********* ******** I will rate him 5 out of 5.

I have recently consulted Dr. Dipta for bridge replacement. My old bridge(front) was made of Metal Ceramic and I had a very bad experience with that. Before meeting Dr. Dipta , I thought that removing old bridge might damage my supporting tooth. But, it went smoothly and it took only 15 min to remove the old one.                                     Then, he suggested me to go with Zirconia bridge as currently Zirconia is best for bridge. On first day, old bridge got removed and tooth impression is taken. Our next appointment was after 2 days and it was basically a trail day, in which they check if everything is fine. If any modifications needed, then they sent bridge to lab. But in my case, it didn't need any modifications. So overall it took 4 days. I really want to thank Dr.  Dipta  and his entire supporting staff for their service .

There is no value for time of an individual person .Today 18 .06.2018 my appointment is 5.30pm and I am reach the doctor room at time but doctor is taking a friend to 7.00 pm ,now I am leaving the room without check up myself .I will go another hospital for check-up.According to me there is no Paitent in the dental doctors there only reason behind ,no value of time .Only good check up for friends etc.

review: Helpful consultation. Was very friendly. I had a dental infection due to one of my wisdom teeth. Helped to extract that which removed the infection.
